div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 21:56 pm CDT

div.div: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 41. Southeast wind 6 to 8 mph becoming west after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
Sunny, with a high near 71. West northwest wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm in the afternoon.
A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly after 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. Southeast wind around 6 mph becoming calm after midnight.
Watch this space for important notifications.
